Name.label: Refractory anemia with excess blasts type 1

TextSection.Contents: A severe type of RAEB characterized by cytopenias and the following hematological parameters: uni- or multilineage dysplasia, 5% to 9% blasts in bone marrow or 2% to 4% in peripheral blood, and no Auer rods (abnormal, needle-shaped or round inclusions in the cytoplasm of myeloblasts and promyelocytes). Median survival has been reported to be 18 months.
